attributes.action: Reverse the damaging decision to expand Heathrow airport
attributes.action_prefix: We the undersigned petition the Prime Minister to
attributes.background: Not only will the expansion destroy government credibility on climate change-it will also destroy 700 homes. An entire village will be lost; and many residents are elderly with no where else to go.

reasons: Duplicate - this is similar to and/or overlaps with an existing petition or petitions
